title: Many bugfixes and a few smaller features

changes.change: Added affixes for the upcoming weeks.
Affixes on the affixes page with an orange background are unconfirmed - useful for when a new season comes out and we don't know the full rotation yet, but can guess.
Enemies that are affected by an affix  (Inspiring, Tormented, Encrypted etc.) are now marked on the map more clearly.
Pull connections now work properly if there's a floor in between pulls (Theater of Pain comes to mind).
Health of enemies now scale according to the selected minimum key level of the current route.
Updating your profile no longer redirects you to your tags page, but back to your profile instead.
Pull percentages are no longer hidden on certain maps unless you zoom out completely and zoom back in again (Mists for example).
Hitting the hotkey for drawing a line no longer causes multiple snackbars to appear.
(Hotfixed a while ago) Floor selection in embed page is now working again.
Cloning a route now also copies the thumbnails over of the cloned route, instead of showing 404s for the thumbnail images for the new route.
If a pull is skipped in a live session because it was marked as obsolete, pull connections no longer to to the top left corner for that pull, but skip the pull instead.
Map icons are now translatable as well.
Health values for various enemies (mostly in Tazavesh) have been corrected according to the most recent hotfixes.
If you uploaded a square image it will now be rounded off properly in the map header (thanks Forced).
